description: Providing a safe and secure meeting place for adults. A dating site where you can build serious relationships or new connections with someone who shares your interests and values. We prioritize privacy and offer simple, user-friendly features to help you find your ideal partner.

register.title: Join us
register.email_validation_error2: Please enter your valid email address
register.email_validation_error3: This email address is already registered
register.password_validation_error1: The password must be at least 8 characters long
register.password_validation_error2: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
register.password_validation_error3: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter
register.password_validation_error4: The password must contain at least one number
register.password_validation_error5: The password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
register.referral_message: You do not have a referral key. We are currently only accepting new registrations by referral. You must be introduced by an already registered member.
register.is_too_many_access: Access is restricted. Please wait a moment and try again.
register.system_error1: A system error has occurred. Please contact the administrator

verifyemail.input_password_policy: Password must be at least 8 characters long, including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols
